conclusion: The light source moves to the back right, affecting shadows.
Initial light source position is front left.
Shadows will shift in the opposite direction of the light source movement.
Shadow size and position change due to light source position affecting light amount.
Shadow direction changes with light source position.
Shadows will be positioned behind objects due to light source in back right.
Shadows will be larger and more pronounced due to increased light intensity.
Shadows will be larger and positioned behind objects with light source in back right.
Summary: Shadows change in size, position, and direction, becoming larger and more pronounced from back right.
